questions.question:
What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int x = 5;
printf("%d", x++ * ++x);
}

What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int x = 3;
printf("%d", x++ + ++x);
}

What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int x = 0;
for (; x < 10; x++) {
if (x % 2 == 0)
continue;
printf("%d ", x);
}
}
What is the return-type of the function sqrt()?

options.d: depends on the data type of the parameter

questions.question:
What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int x = 5;
int y = 2;
printf("%f", (float)x / y);
}

What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int x = 5;
int *ptr = &x;
printf("%d", (*ptr)++);
printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int x = 5;
int *ptr = &x;
printf("%d", (*ptr) + 2);
printf("%d", x);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

#include
int m() {
printf("hello");
}
void main() {
int k = m();
printf("%d", k);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

#include
int *m() {
int *p = 5;
return p;
}
void main() {
int *k = m();
printf("%d", k);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

#include
void m(int k) {
printf("hi");
}
void m(double k) {
printf("hello");
}
void main() {
m(3);
}

What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int arr[] = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5};
printf("%d", arr[5]);
}

What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int arr[5] = {1, 2, 3};
printf("%d", arr[4]);
}

What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int x = 5;
int *ptr = &x;
printf("%p", ptr + 1);
}

options.A: Address of x in hexadecimal format
options.C: Address of x in hexadecimal format + 1

questions.question:
What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
char str[] = "Hello, World!";
printf("%s", str + 7);
}
What is the default return type if it is not specified in function definition?

What will be the output of the following C code?

#include
enum m {JAN, FEB, MAR};
enum m foo();
int main() {
enum m i = foo();
printf("%d\n", i);
}
int foo() {
return JAN;
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

#include
int x = 5;
void main() {
int x = 3;
printf("%d", x);
{
x = 4;
}
printf("%d", x);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

#include
int main() {
printf("%d", d++);
}
int d = 10;

What will be the output of the following C code?

#include
static int x = 5;
void main() {
x = 9;
{
int x = 4;
}
printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following program?

#include
void main() {
int x = 5;
int *ptr = &x;
printf("%d", ++*ptr);
printf("%d", x);
}
